decks.notes: This deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with low-cost creatures and sacrificing them to trigger powerful effects. By sacrificing creatures like Mortician Beetle and Infestation Sage, the deck can buff its own creatures while also drawing cards with Village Rites. With cards like Perigee Beckoner and Rite of Consumption, the deck can deliver significant damage to the opponent quickly. The use of cards like Unearth and Supernatural Stamina also allows for recursion and protection of key creatures. Overall, this deck aims to be fast-paced and aggressive.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly overwhelm your opponent with a swarm of red creatures and aggressive spells. Using a combination of efficient creatures like Goblin Bushwhacker and Burning-Tree Emissary, along with burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Galvanic Blast, you aim to deal damage early and often. Cards like Clockwork Percussionist and Rally at the Hornburg help you maintain pressure on your opponent while Experimental Synthesizer provides card advantage. The goal is to be fast and relentless, punishing your opponent for any hesitation or lack of defense.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly fill the graveyard with creatures using cards like Lead the Stampede, Gatecreeper Vine, and Generous Ent. Once the graveyard is stacked, the player utilizes Balustrade Spy to mill themselves, triggering the combo with Dread Return to bring back Lotleth Giant for a massive amount of damage. The deck also includes cards like Mesmeric Fiend and Masked Vandal for disruption, while utilizing Axebane Guardian and Overgrown Battlement for mana ramp to support the combo. The deck focuses on quickly assembling the necessary pieces for a game-winning combo.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly bring out small, aggressive creatures to deal damage to the opponent while also utilizing a mix of countermagic and card draw to maintain card advantage and disrupt the opponent's game plan. The deck includes efficient creatures like Faerie Seer, Brinebarrow Intruder, and Ninja of the Deep Hours, as well as counter spells like Counterspell and Spellstutter Sprite. The strategy revolves around overwhelming the opponent with a steady stream of threats while protecting your own board and resources.

This deck focuses on establishing control over the game through a combination of counterspells, removal spells, and defensive creatures. It aims to stall the opponent's attacks while gradually building up resources through mana-fixing Gates. The deck heavily relies on card draw and manipulation to maintain consistency and outvalue the opponent over the course of the game. By controlling the pace of the match and outlasting the opponent's threats, this deck aims to secure victory through attrition and smart resource management.

The deck focuses on controlling the game by utilizing a mix of removal spells, card draw, and recursion. It aims to outvalue opponents by generating card advantage through effects like Ichor Wellspring and Lembas, while also disrupting their game plan with removal like Snuff Out and Fanatical Offering. The inclusion of cards like Avenging Hunter and Thorn of the Black Rose provide additional threats and ways to maintain card advantage. The mana base is optimized to support the deck's strategy while also providing consistent access to all necessary colors.

The focus of this deck is to generate massive amounts of mana using High Tide, allowing the player to chain together multiple spells for a powerful combo finish. Lórien Revealed provides card advantage, while cards like Hidden Strings and Psychic Puppetry help to untap lands for even more mana generation. Preordain, Brainstorm, and Peer Through Depths help dig for combo pieces, while disruptive spells like Disrupt keep the opponent in check. The deck aims to draw through the library quickly and efficiently, setting up a game-winning combo turn.

The focus of this Mono Blue Aggro deck is to aggressively control the game through countering spells and efficiently casting cheap creatures and instants. By utilizing card draw effects like Thought Scour and Mental Note, along with efficient counterspells like Counterspell and Spell Pierce, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while steadily building up board presence with creatures like Delver of Secrets and Cryptic Serpent. The inclusion of Tolarian Terror and Sleep of the Dead adds additional tempo control and disruption to ensure victory.

This Mono Blue Aggro deck focuses on quickly deploying cheap creatures like Delver of Secrets and Cryptic Serpent, while using card draw spells like Ponder and Deep Analysis to maintain hand advantage. Counterspells like Counterspell and Dispel are used to protect our creatures and disrupt our opponent's game plan. The deck also includes disruptive spells like Sleep of the Dead and Deem Inferior to control the board. Lórien Revealed is used to pump our creatures and finish off our opponent quickly. The deck aims to apply pressure early and maintain tempo throughout the game.

This Jund Aggro deck focuses on using sacrifice effects and artifact recursion to overwhelm opponents with efficient threats and disrupt their game plan. The deck aims to control the board through removal spells and graveyard hate while generating card advantage with cards like Ichor Wellspring and Refurbished Familiar. By utilizing sacrifice outlets like Writhing Chrysalis and Fanatical Offering, the deck can create powerful swings in tempo and pressure opponents into making suboptimal plays. The combination of aggressive creatures and disruptive elements makes this deck a versatile and formidable opponent in the Pauper 1 vs 1 format.

The main focus of this deck is to generate a large amount of mana using the card High Tide, allowing the player to chain together a series of spells to dig through their deck and find key combo pieces. The deck includes cards that can untap lands, draw cards, and search for specific cards in order to set up a potentially game-winning combo. By efficiently utilizing High Tide and various card draw spells, the player can quickly assemble their combo and overwhelm their opponent with a massive amount of mana and spells.

The focus of this deck is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with powerful, low-cost creatures and buff them with a variety of auras to create huge threats. By combining evasive abilities with strong enchantments like Rancor, Ethereal Armor, and Armadillo Cloak, the deck aims to deal massive amounts of damage in a short amount of time. With additional support from cards like Ancestral Mask and Utopia Sprawl to enhance creature power, this deck is all about aggressive plays and maximizing the impact of auras on the battlefield.

The main focus of this deck is to overwhelm your opponent with quick and aggressive red creatures and burn spells. By efficiently utilizing low-cost creatures and powerful burn spells, this deck aims to deal damage quickly and efficiently to secure a victory. With a mix of creatures that can pump each other up and spells that can deal direct damage to the opponent or their creatures, the deck is designed to put pressure on the opponent from the outset and maintain that pressure throughout the game.

The main focus of this deck is to overwhelm your opponent with a fast and aggressive strategy using low-cost creatures and burn spells. By leveraging cards like Goblin Bushwhacker and Burning-Tree Emissary, along with powerful burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Fireblast, the deck aims to quickly reduce the opponent's life total to zero. The inclusion of Clockwork Percussionist and Rally at the Hornburg provides additional support for the aggressive playstyle, making it a formidable force in Pauper 1 vs 1 matches.

The main focus of this Pauper deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a relentless swarm of Elf creatures. By utilizing cards like Lead the Stampede and Winding Way to draw more creatures, along with mana generators like Priest of Titania and Elvish Mystic, the deck aims to quickly build a wide board presence. Cards like Timberwatch Elf and Generous Ent provide buffs to the Elves to further increase their effectiveness in combat, ultimately leading to a fast and aggressive gameplay style.

This deck focuses on aggressively attacking the opponent with low-cost creatures and burn spells, aiming to deal damage quickly and efficiently. By utilizing cards like Goblin Bushwhacker and Burning-Tree Emissary to flood the board with creatures, combined with direct damage spells like Galvanic Blast and Lightning Bolt, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent before they have a chance to stabilize. The strategy is to maintain pressure and force the opponent to react to the constant barrage of threats, ultimately leading to a swift victory.
